message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $950000. We believe this offers a great value for the quality and benefits you will receive. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market rate. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but after reviewing it, I must respectfully decline. We believe in maintaining a high standard for our products and their pricing. Our next offer for the product is $900000. We hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market rate and the value I'll receive from the product. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. After further consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you at $890000. This price reflects the value we place on the product while also considering your input. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $880000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market rate and the value I'll receive from the product. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I've carefully considered your latest offer and am prepared to accept it. I'm pleased to confirm our agreement at $880000 for the product. I look forward to finalizing the transaction with you.
